import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; const Login = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, } = useForm(); const onSubmit = (data) => console.log(data); const handleClose = () => { setIsOpen(false); }; return ( <> {isOpen && (

Login

{errors.Email && Email is required}
{errors.Password && Password is required}

Not Registered? Sign up

)} ); }; export default Login;
